content: this teeny turtle only takes about 20 minutes to make the small turtle pictured measures 3 inches long the larger one measures 4 inches long the head is sewn to the body the shell and tummy are made separately then crocheted together the flippers are no-sew for this pattern i used i-love-this yarn colors pink and green please leave a project of your teeny turtle and a picture when you ve finished i would love to see it enjoy
